generated.css: @import url("https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Poppins:wght@100;500&display=swap");@import url("https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Orbitron:wght@400..900&display=swap");@import url("https://fonts.cdnfonts.com/css/beam-weapon");*{margin:0}*,:after :before{box-sizing:border-box}body,html{overflow-x:hidden}body{font-family:Poppins,sans-serif;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;line-height:1.5;-webkit-font-smoothing:antialiased;height:100vw}button,input,select,textarea{font:inherit}h1,h2,h3,h4,h5,h6,p{overflow-wrap:break-word}a{color:inherit;text-decoration:none}ul{list-style:none}.section{overflow:hidden;min-height:100vh;padding:5rem 1rem 1rem}@media (min-width:650px){.section{padding:5rem}}.projects__header{font-size:60px;font-style:italic;padding-bottom:10px;font-family:Beam Weapon,sans-serif;font-family:Beam Weapon\ 3D,sans-serif;font-family:Beam Weapon Gradient,sans-serif;font-family:Beam Weapon Halftone,sans-serif;font-family:Beam Weapon Laser,sans-serif;font-family:Beam Weapon\ 3D Italic,sans-serif;font-family:Beam Weapon Condensed,sans-serif;font-family:Beam Weapon Condensed Italic,sans-serif;font-family:Beam Weapon Expanded,sans-serif;font-family:Beam Weapon Expanded Italic,sans-serif;font-family:Beam Weapon Gradient Italic,sans-serif;font-family:Beam Weapon Halftone Italic,sans-serif;font-family:Beam Weapon Italic,sans-serif;font-family:Beam Weapon Laser Italic,sans-serif;font-family:Beam Weapon Leftalic,sans-serif;font-family:Beam Weapon Super-Italic,sans-serif;color:#c0f}.project__header{display:grid;grid-template-columns:1fr 3fr;gap:1rem;font-family:sans-serif}.project__header span{border-top:1px solid #fff;padding:1rem;font-size:30px;text-align:center}.project__infos{margin-top:1rem}.project__infos--name{position:relative;font-size:3vw;font-family:sans-serif;display:flex;align-items:center;font-weight:400}.project__img{position:relative;width:90vw;height:700px}.project__img img{width:60vw;height:600px;object-fit:cover;position:absolute;right:10vw;top:3rem}.project__links{padding-top:3rem}.project__tags{position:absolute;bottom:1rem;display:flex;flex-direction:column;gap:1rem}.project .coolFunnyLink{position:relative;font-family:sans-serif}.project .coolFunnyLink svg{position:absolute;bottom:-5px;left:0;stroke-width:1px;width:95px}.project .coolFunnyLink path{stroke:#c0f;stroke-dasharray:1;stroke-dashoffset:1;transition:stroke-dashoffset .6s cubic-bezier(.7,0,.3,1)}.project .coolFunnyLink:hover path{stroke-dashoffset:0;transition-timing-function:cubic-bezier(.8,1,.7,1)}.coolCircleEyeButton{position:relative;display:inline-block;padding-left:20px}.coolCircleEyeButton .textCircle{display:block;width:250px;animation:rotate 7s linear infinite;webkit-animation:rotate 7s linear infinite}.coolCircleEyeButton .textCircle text{font-family:Arial,sans-serif;font-size:20px;fill:#fff}@keyframes rotate{to{transform:rotate(-1turn);-webkit-transform:rotate(-1turn);-moz-transform:rotate(-1turn);-ms-transform:rotate(-1turn);-o-transform:rotate(-1turn)}}.coolCircleEyeButton:hover text{font-weight:600}.coolCircleEyeButton:hover .eye__inner,.coolCircleEyeButton:hover .eye__lashes-up,.coolCircleEyeButton:hover .eye_iris{animation:hide 2s step-end infinite;-webkit-animation:hide 2s step-end infinite}@keyframes hide{0%{opacity:0}10%{opacity:1}}.coolCircleEyeButton:hover .eye__lashes-down{animation:show 2s step-end infinite;-webkit-animation:show 2s step-end infinite}@keyframes show{0%{opacity:1}10%{opacity:0}}.eye{position:absolute;width:60px;height:60px;top:50%;left:50%;transform:translate(-50%,-50%);-webkit-transform:translate(-50%,-50%);-moz-transform:translate(-50%,-50%);-ms-transform:translate(-50%,-50%);-o-transform:translate(-50%,-50%)}.eye__inner,.eye__lashes-down,.eye__lashes-up,.eye__outer{stroke:#fff;fill:none;stroke-width:1.5px}.eye__lashes-down{opacity:0}@media (max-width:1350){.projects{padding:3rem}.project__img img{width:74vw;right:5rem}.project__infos--name{font-size:38px}.project .coolCircleEyeButton{transform:translate(-14rem,-3rem);-webkit-transform:translate(-14rem,-3rem);-moz-transform:translate(-14rem,-3rem);-ms-transform:translate(-14rem,-3rem);-o-transform:translate(-14rem,-3rem)}}@media (max-width:1350) and (max-width:740px){.projects{padding:1rem}.project__tags{flex-direction:row;top:0;left:0}}@media (max-width:1350){.project__infos--name{font-size:35px}.project__infos--name span{display:none}.project__infos--name .project__img img{width:85vw;right:3rem}}@media (max-width:1350) and (max-width:440px){.projects .coolCircleEyeButton{transform:translate(0);-webkit-transform:translate(0);-moz-transform:translate(0);-ms-transform:translate(0);-o-transform:translate(0)}.project__tags{gap:6px;font-size:14px}.project__header span{font-size:25px}}
